Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Love-making \Love"-mak`ing\, n. 1. Courtship. --Bacon. [1913 Webster]
2. Sexual intercourse. [PJC]

lovemaking n : sexual activities (often including sexual intercourse) between two people; "his lovemaking disgusted her"; "he hadn't had any love in months"; "he has a very complicated love life" [syn: {sexual love}, {making love}, {love}, {love life}]
